long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
May 11, 2024
I released "URL Shortener for Amazon Classic" on the Chrome Web Store. This version is based on "URL Shortener for Amazon" version 1.2.2 and has been configured with permissions that prevent it from operating on sites other than Amazon. If you prefer not to have the extension operate outside of Amazon, please use this version.

===================================

This extension shortens URLs for individual Amazon product pages, Prime Video pages, and customer review pages, and copies them to the clipboard along with the page title if needed. For non-Amazon pages, URL shortening is not performed, but copying the URL and page title is still possible. Additionally, the extension offers an option to remove query parameters from URLs.

To use it, right-click on the target page and select the option to generate a shortened URL from the context menu, which also allows you to copy the title. Additionally, shortcut keys can be set for each function, enabling quick operations.

(In the update on March 21, 2024 to comply with Manifest V3, I added the permission to copy URLs to the clipboard. As a result, users who have already installed the extension may find it temporarily disabled. I apologize for the inconvenience.)

(Note: Please be aware that if Amazon changes its specifications, the URLs shortened by this extension may no longer work.)
(Note 2: For security reasons, the execution of extensions is not permitted on Chrome Web Store pages.)

===================================

Commands (Available Features):

- URL
    Create and copy a shortened URL.
- Page Title / URL
    Create and copy a shortened URL along with the page title.
- Page Title
    Copy the page title.
- URL (w/o QueryParams)
    Remove query parameters and copy the URL.

Options:

- Remove "www" from URLs(Amazon only)
- Show Completion Notification

===================================

Eg.

- Original URL
https://www.amazon.com/JavaScript-Good-Parts-ebook/dp/B0026OR2ZY/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1IG4MJL9Y6A7K&dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.mYOkZKD1GOKrJDkvW6_zsocI0qkLFbtRL77scWFsVyuSLFu17vya98DpSQtDqtB4zmgiVpiLJ-pIhY5HWi99Z4-25Ku8K4zs3F2UhZq9lQpz33tE6WadCF1cR6KyHoMtrFhVfFfTAozJpEbya5j2YMo2WvaWEt2Kg2hl0a8CgJC9ZJaTYR0rOWcwRGlE52-i26ChuX8wkDRy8TsdWH7mu6NglBch5GPI0IKzhoGSGXM.c7xNSKstCZa308aPC71v84vAVC59VVgPYdQVmeJ2onE&dib_tag=se&keywords=JavaScript%3A+The+Good+Parts%3A+The+Good+Parts&qid=1711001407&s=digital-text&sprefix=javascript+the+good+parts+the+good+parts%2Cdigital-text%2C221&sr=1-1

- URL
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0026OR2ZY

- Page Title / URL
JavaScript: The Good Parts: The Good Parts 1, Crockford, Douglas, eBook - Amazon.com
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0026OR2ZY

- Page Title
JavaScript: The Good Parts: The Good Parts 1, Crockford, Douglas, eBook - Amazon.com

- URL(with Remove 'www' from URLs)
https://amazon.com/dp/B0026OR2ZY

- URL(w/o QueryParams)
https://www.amazon.com/JavaScript-Good-Parts-ebook/dp/B0026OR2ZY/ref=sr_1_1

===================================

Supported pages:

- General product pages
- Amazon Prime Video pages
- Customer review pages
- Non-Amazon Pages

URL shortening on Amazon is only possible for individual item pages and does not work on pages listing multiple products.

===================================

Development and management of this extension is a personal hobby performed in my private time. Therefore, I apologize, but I cannot promise individual support or responses to specific requests and reports. I kindly ask for your understanding.

===================================

If You Like This Tool

If you like this Chrome extension, I would appreciate it if you could give it a high rating. It motivates the developer.

I hope this tool I’ve developed can be of some help to you. If you find it useful, you’re welcome to support me through Buy Me a Coffee. With your support, I look forward to simple pleasures like strolling down the street with a beer in hand, sharing ramen with new friends, or enjoying tea while practicing my broken English. Of course, just knowing that the tool is useful is more than enough, so please feel free to use it without any obligation. Also, please understand that even if you choose to support me, I won’t be able to accommodate requests for additional features or changes to the tool. Thank you for your understanding.

long.ja:
2024/05/11
「URL Shortener for Amazon」のバージョン1.2.2を基に、Amazon以外のサイトでは動作しないように権限を設定した「URL Shortener for Amazon Classic」をChromeウェブストアで公開しました。Amazon以外で動作させたくない場合は、そちらをご利用ください。

===================================

この拡張機能は、Amazonの商品ページ、Prime Videoページ、カスタマーレビュー、それぞれの個別ページのURLを短縮し、必要に応じてページタイトルと共にクリップボードにコピーします。
Amazon以外のページではURLの短縮は行われませんが、URLやページタイトルのコピーは可能です。
また、URLからクエリパラメータを削除するオプションも提供しています。

利用する際は、対象ページで右クリックして表示されるコンテキストメニューから短縮URLを生成でき、タイトルのコピーも選択できます。さらに、各機能にはショートカットキーを設定することができ、迅速に操作を行うことが可能です。

（こちらに表示されている画像は英語ですが、日本語環境でインストールすると日本語メニューになります。）

（2024年3月21日のManifest V3に対応させるアップデートで、クリップボードへのURLコピーの権限を追加しました。これに伴い、既にインストール済みのユーザーは一時的に当拡張機能が無効化されている可能性があります。ご不便をおかけし申し訳ありません。）

（注意：Amazonの仕様が変更された場合、この拡張機能で短縮したURLが機能しなくなる可能性があることをご注意ください。）
（注意2：セキュリティ上の理由から、Chromeウェブストアのページ内で拡張機能の実行は許可されていません。）

===================================

コマンド（使える機能）：

- URL
    短縮URLを作成してコピー
- Page Title / URL
    短縮URLを作成してページタイトルと共にコピー
- Page Title
    ページタイトルをコピー
- URL(w/o QueryParams)
    URLからクエリパラメータを削除してコピー

オプション：

- URLからwwwを取り除く（Amazonのみ）
- コピー完了通知を表示する

===================================

例：

- オリジナルURL
https://www.amazon.com/JavaScript-Good-Parts-ebook/dp/B0026OR2ZY/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1IG4MJL9Y6A7K&dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.mYOkZKD1GOKrJDkvW6_zsocI0qkLFbtRL77scWFsVyuSLFu17vya98DpSQtDqtB4zmgiVpiLJ-pIhY5HWi99Z4-25Ku8K4zs3F2UhZq9lQpz33tE6WadCF1cR6KyHoMtrFhVfFfTAozJpEbya5j2YMo2WvaWEt2Kg2hl0a8CgJC9ZJaTYR0rOWcwRGlE52-i26ChuX8wkDRy8TsdWH7mu6NglBch5GPI0IKzhoGSGXM.c7xNSKstCZa308aPC71v84vAVC59VVgPYdQVmeJ2onE&dib_tag=se&keywords=JavaScript%3A+The+Good+Parts%3A+The+Good+Parts&qid=1711001407&s=digital-text&sprefix=javascript+the+good+parts+the+good+parts%2Cdigital-text%2C221&sr=1-1

- URL
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0026OR2ZY

- Page Title / URL
JavaScript: The Good Parts: The Good Parts 1, Crockford, Douglas, eBook - Amazon.com
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0026OR2ZY

- Page Title
JavaScript: The Good Parts: The Good Parts 1, Crockford, Douglas, eBook - Amazon.com

- URL (オプション: "URLからwwwを取り除く"をON)
https://amazon.com/dp/B0026OR2ZY

- URL (w/o QueryParams)
https://www.amazon.com/JavaScript-Good-Parts-ebook/dp/B0026OR2ZY/ref=sr_1_1

===================================

対応ページ：

- 一般的な製品ページ
- Amazon Prime Videoページ
- カスタマーレビューページ
- Amazon以外のページ

AmazonでURLを短縮できるのはそれぞれの個別ページで、商品のリストアップされているページなどでは動作しません。
